long_description: Perfect during yoga or at the gym, the REI Sariska pants offer a sleek, comfortable fit. Polyester and spandex fabric offers 4-way stretch, moisture-wicking comfort and excellent support. Brushed finish feels soft against skin. Fabric provides UPF 50+ sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Angled side seams avoid abrasion points during yoga sessions, and flat seams enhance comfort. Comfortable elastic waistband features a bit of extra width for yoga poses. The active fit of the REI Sariska pants moves effortlessly with the body and won't bind or twist.
short_description: Perfect during yoga or at the gym, the REI Sariska pants offer a sleek, comfortable fit.
